comment: Rob Bowers aka joined in January of . He had other social media accounts before that and was "radicalized" way before he joined us here. Not that facts like this will matter to I am sure... ^ TBH if that goes viral things might get interesting -- it's like a random sampling of Gab posts. Lots of reposts of high profile accounts. ... PS: WOW i think his Gab posts being shared all over means a HUGE increase in visitors; I experienced huge lag for maybe minutes but now seems to have resolved itself. Nice surprise load test!

      :snt4 (h2 / have-condition-91

                        :ARG1 (t3 / thing

                              :mod t2))))
      :ARG2 (g2 / go-08
            :ARG1 (v / viral))
      :snt5 r2
      :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
      :ARG2 (s2 / sample-01
            :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p3 / post-01
                        :ARG0 (p4 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab")))
                  :mod (r3 / random)))

comment: He was here on GAB. Looks like GAB killed his account pretty quick. Twitter and Facebook always quickly kill accounts like this. I thought GAB would be different, but they are not. I guess they figure those that kill a bunch of people don't have free speech anymore.
amr:

      :snt1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (h / he)
            :ARG2 (h2 / here
                  :location-of (g / government-organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "GAB"))))
      :snt2 (l / look-02

                  :ARG1-of (q / quick-02

      :snt3 (k2 / kill-01

                  :op1 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Twitter"))
                  :op2 (p3 / publication

                              :op1 "Facebook")))
            :ARG1 (a3 / account
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01

            :ARG1-of (q2 / quick-02

      :time (a4 / always)

                        :ARG1 g
                        :name (n4 / name

      :ARG2 (d2 / differ-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 g)
      :snt5 (g2 / guess-01

            :ARG1 (f / figure-01
                  :ARG0 (t3 / they)
                  :ARG1 (h4 / have-03
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (k3 / kill-01
                                    :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                          :quant (b2 / bunch)))
                              :ARG1 (s / speak-01
